Internship
• Organization: Global Infotech, Noida
• Duration: 6 Months

Projects Handled - SHOPPINGKART
1. Project Environment: Online Shopping
2. Language Used: CSS, JAVASCRIPTING, SQL SERVER and HTML.

Project Description:
The Project aim is to make the online shopping store by using languages like HTML, Java scripting
etc.
It is used by the internet users (customers) so that they can order the products and make deals
at a click.
The store has facilities for buying goods from the website. Further we can add delivery options in
the website also.

Key Responsibilities:
• Involved in Analysis and developing the online store.
• Interacting extensively with end users on requirement gathering, development and
documentation.
• Involved with key departments to analyze areas and discuss the primary requirements for the
project.
• Developed complex codes to simplify the online store interface.
• Imported Data from relational database into Java as per detailed specifications.

Strengths:
• Disciplined, dedicated and hardworking with an ability to easily adapt to changing work
environments and technologies.
• Keen learner with ability to learn new knowledge with ease.
• Good Inter-Personal and Communication Skills.
• Confident.
• Good presentation skills.
• Good team working ability.
